_source.short_desc: Get your business to full capacity with 10to8 Scheduling Software. Rid your business of wasted time and no-shows. Get Started Free!
_source.long_desc:
All-in-one Appointment Scheduling Software with a Free Forever Plan. If you want to reduce no-shows, increase capacity and boost repeat business, 10to8 is the solution. A Free Forever Plan is available for small businesses.

10to8 offers SMS & email reminders, customizable online booking page, online payment, 2-way calendar sync, group bookings, integration with 1,500+ apps, access on any device, and appointment history & client activity tracking.
_source.pricing_details:
Free Forever Plan | Free | 100 bookings + 2 staff logins

Basic Plan | $9.6/month | 100 bookings + 2 staff logins + branding

Grow Plan | $20/month | 300 bookings + 3 staff logins + branding + enhanced features

Bigger Business Plan | $40/month | 600 bookings + 6 staff logins + branding + enhanced features + tools for HIPAA & signed BAA

Enterprise Plan | Bespoke Pricing | Bespoke appointments, staff logins & features

For more information visit 10to8.com/pricing
_source.target_audience: Businesses of all sizes regardless of sector or industry. We have clients in banking, healthcare, education, customer service, sales, beauty, and even alpaca farming.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Meet the personal scheduling assistant that works 24/7 behind the scenes to fill your calendar & take busywork off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations to you and your clients, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments or accept donations. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your schedule, get booked 24/7, send automated reminders, manage memberships, securely process payments & more. Starts at $25/mo
related_products.features: Boost your productivity and free up time with Vagaro Salon, Spa & Fitness Appointment Scheduling Software. Schedule appointments from a desktop or use our App to manage clients on the go. Get booked on our marketplace, your booking page, Facebook, Yelp, Instagram or on your own website via our booking widget. Send automated reminders and emails. Securely process payments. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Pricing starts @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Housecall Pro is a top-rated business solution for home service professionals to streamline scheduling, dispatching, payments, & more.
related_products.features:
Call now to get up to 80% off your first month: 855-921-4757.

Easily Schedule Jobs, Assign Team Members, and Set Arrival Windows in only a few clicks. Housecall Pro is an all-in-one Field Service management app that helps automate business processes and workflows. Trusted by over 25,000 home service companies.

related_products.short_desc: SimplePractice is the #1 HIPAA compliant practice management software. Join 100000+ thriving health & wellness professionals.
related_products.features:
The all-in-one practice management solution for private practitioners. Practitioners who switched to SimplePractice spent 35% less time on scheduling each week. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. Send paperless intakes and insurance forms.  Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. 
Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest.
Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify appointment scheduling and automate reminders with Mindbody scheduling software and streamline business management.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
related_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_products.short_desc: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks, like scheduling meetings, quick and easy.
related_products.features: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks like scheduling and organizing meetings fast and easy. The worlds leader in online scheduling, doodle.com is used by over 30 million people each month. Doodle AG is headquartered in Zurich.

related_products.short_desc: Fresha is world's leading appointment booking software and is totally subscription-free!
related_products.features: Fresha is the world's leading booking software for appointment scheduling and is totally subscription-free! Join 70,000+ businesses and 250,000 professionals who use Fresha to boost their sales in 120+ countries. Fresha is a simple, flexible and powerful booking software with all the advanced features you need to run your business. Optional paid features include integrated payment processing, deposits and no-show protection. Only pay for what you use, with zero monthly fees.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to manage and grow your brand from a fully-integrated singular platform. You can?t be great without integrate!
related_products.features: Enjoy the fruits of a busy schedule . When it comes to business, time is money. Scheduling allows you to maximize your time and revenue by giving you full control over your schedule, staff, services and more. Create your free account today to learn more and explore plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for all service companies! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.

Manage your business with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments (POS).

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.

_source.short_desc: Get your business to full capacity with 10to8 Scheduling Software. Rid your business of wasted time and no-shows. Get Started Free!
_source.long_desc:
Powerful appointment scheduling and online booking software  Trusted by 50,000+ businesses worldwide.

Let clients book your free slots and take payments online. Automatically send SMS & email reminders and reduce no-shows by up to 90%. Track client activity and attendance history.

Avoid double-bookings by setting up calendar sync with Google, iCal, and Outlook. Integrate with over 1,500 apps, works on any device and operating system. 

Get Started Free Today!
_source.pricing_details:
Free Forever Plan | Free | 100 bookings + 2 staff logins

Basic Plan | $9.6/month | 100 bookings + 2 staff logins + branding

Grow Plan | $20/month | 300 bookings + 3 staff logins + branding + enhanced features

Bigger Business Plan | $40/month | 600 bookings + 6 staff logins + branding + enhanced features + tools for HIPAA & signed BAA

Enterprise Plan | Bespoke Pricing | Bespoke appointments, staff logins & features

For more information visit 10to8.com/pricing

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. Appointment Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Medical Scheduling software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Spa software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Spa tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Spa software automates and manages health/medical spa operations. Medical Spa (also called Med Spa or Medi Spa) solutions typically feature easy integration with cash registers, bar code readers and other point of sale hardware. Medical Spas provide treatments including skin tightening, laser hair removal, peels, liposuction, cosmetic dental work and more. Medical Spas typically use these applications to add efficiency and value to a wide variety of business processes including: appointment scheduling, online calendar, client management and marketing, employee data, commission calculation, inventory control, payroll, point of sale and others. For related products see Salon software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Spa software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Spa tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Spa software automates all aspects of business management for various types of spas, including day spas. Software functionality typically includes inventory management, appointment scheduling, gift card processing, point of sale, and other retail customer service oriented capabilities. Spa software is related to Medical Spa software and Salon Software

pricing_plans.name: Small Business
pricing_plans.description: Built for small businesses, this pricing plan is free forever and includes 100 appt / month and 2 staff logins.

pricing_plans.name: Basic
pricing_plans.description: Includes 100 appt / month and 2 staff logins and customizeable branding.

pricing_plans.name: Grow
pricing_plans.description: For an growing buisness, this plan includes 300 appt/month and 3 staff logins. As well as custom branding and SMS.

pricing_plans.description: Built for an bigger business, this plan includes 600 appt/month and 6 staff logins
